trans-unit.source: Handles the import of messages from WSDL documents using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 處理訊息從 WSDL 文件使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>匯的入

trans-unit.source: The XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter is invoked when converting a WSDL description.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 WSDL 描述時，會叫用 XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter。

trans-unit.source: It examines the WSDL documents and generates an in-memory description to be used later for code generation.
trans-unit.target: 它會檢查 WSDL 文件，並產生記憶體中描述，以便稍後用在產生程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a service description and schema set to use when importing a set of WSDL documents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的服務描述和結構描述集合匯入一組 WSDL 文件時使用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a service description and schema set to use when importing a set of WSDL documents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的服務描述和結構描述集合匯入一組 WSDL 文件時使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> that represents the WSDL documents to inspect.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"> </xref> ，代表要檢查的 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> that represents the schemas to use when converting messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> ，表示要轉換的訊息時使用的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that contains the policy documents to use when importing messages.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> ，其中包含匯入訊息時使用的原則文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> to use for the import.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> that represents the context to use.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> that represents the importer to use.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext"></xref> that represents the endpoint to import.
